company_name: SUMP & STAMMER GMBH INTERNATIONAL FOOD SUPPLY
supplier_of: import-export - food and agriculture | international food supply
information: Sump & Stammer GmbH – International Food Supply is an international trading company, specialized in the world-wide distribution of different food products to multinational catering companies, the cruise industry, hotels and resorts, importers and wholesalers as well as ship suppliers. Sump & Stammer combines tradition and experience with modern, creative management and supply the full range of food products to its customers throughout the world. In 2003 the company took over the activities of one of Europe's leading transit meat traders. Sump & Stammer’s cold stores, meet the highest standards and keep stocks of more than 5.000tons of refrigerated, frozen and no temperature controlled food, permitting very short lead times for delivery by truck, in containers or by airfreight. Sump & Stammer offers multi-temperature-shipments of 100 or more products per truck, groupage deliveries or bulk supply of just one product.
keywords: Import-export - food and agriculture, international food supply
